Reviews.Title: Great Bracket
Reviews.Author: Hoople
Reviews.Content: This is a great bracket it works well with my camera. Its adjustable height is great. This bracket made mounting the cameras easy and very straightforward. This is a very cool product!

Reviews.Title: great for new LED projectors
Reviews.Author: Supermuncher
Reviews.Content: This thing is fantastic for the new breeds of LED proctors. I use it with a k130/k132. Bolted it to a piece of plexiglass I ordered off of amazon ~$8 using M5 Screws and nuts. Functions great, and height adjustment works flawlessly. As always don't over tighten or you will destroy the mechanism real fast!Depending on the power-adapters end-piece, you might have to remove/reattach it in order to fit the cable through the center cable run of the pole if you want a seamless look.

ProductInfo.Features:
Ceiling mount bracket stand for security camera
Adjustable length from 24 to 40 inch
Tilt 180 degrees, swivel 360 degrees
Aluminum alloy construction, light weight, heavy duty. Loading capacity 8 lb
Cable management through extension pole
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 24-40 Inch Adjustable Tilt Swivel Bracket Long Drop Ceiling Mount Stand for CCTV Security Camera Home Surveillance System 1P4
